name: Melisandre [GOT] Mini Dude #117
description: Lady Melisandre, often referred to as the Red Woman or the Red Witch, was a Red Priestess in the religion of R'hllor, and had been a close counselor to King Stannis Baratheon in his campaign to take the Iron Throne. Following Stannis's death, she revived Jon Snow and served him as an advisor, until she was banished. [https://gameofthrones.fandom.com/wiki/Melisandre]
